name: Engine Gremlin
description:
A game where you play as a gremlin in a guy's engine and try to make him go OUT OF CONTROL.  Unplug, unscrew, and undo whatever necessary to get the job done, but make sure he doesn't see you!  Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Programming & Design by Jackson Sweet

Art & Animation by Ethan Hammel
